data.text: @mallory_jht Hi Mallory, sorry to hear about the delay on your flight. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi

@stevoh1986 Hi Stevoh, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands, we'll look into this and appreciate your feedback. If you require assistance on a specific booking, please feel free to DM us. Thanks  – Mauri

@tomatosauce8888 Hi @tomatosauce8888, I appreciate how upsetting change of flights can be and we know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy
@lesposen Hi Les, The website is definitely still taking bookings and that’s where you’ll get the cheapest fares! We recommend clearing your cookies and cache, then trying again. Thanks – Mauri

@b9cntr Hi Amit, sorry to hear this. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie

@RichelleVHP We’d like to look into this for you, Richelle, as we’re usually really proud of the experience we provide our customers. Could you please send us a DM?  We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi
@PeterTawil5 Hi Peter, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into this further? Thanks – Paul

@klelith Hi Kim, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. You can be certain that our team are working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. If you need further assistance on a specific booking, feel free to send us a DM. Thanks - Mauri

@pm_maca Hi, sorry to hear this. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Feel free to send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie

@ChrisH85888994 Hi Chris. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Dan

@RichelleVHP Hi Richelle, sorry to hear about the delay. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, can you send us a DM with more info? Thanks - Dan
@gplesse Hi Grégory, sorry to hear about your flight. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into this further? Thanks - Paul
@Justinl15080031 Hi Justin, I appreciate you’re upset. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Dan

@GinaHagan5 Hi Gina. I appreciate your frustration, carry-on and checked baggage are weighed separately so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. Please send us a DM so that we can look into your booking further. Thanks – Dan
@fhina_ar Hi Arfina, sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. Would you mind sending us a DM for us to check this for you? Thanks - Kimmy

@Justinl15080031 Hi Justin, sorry to hear that your flight was changed. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, can you send us a DM with more info?  Thanks – Dan
@TheCybercop1 2/2 We have escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Thanks – Leslie
@TheCybercop1 1/2 Hi Susan, the use of masks is mandatory on all flights and in all airports across Australia, except where a medical exemption exists.

@gonnyosa That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have Aji. Sorry to hear about this, would you mind sending us a DM with more info so we can look into it further? Thanks - Dan

@BrittA2211 Hi Britt, I appreciate you’re upset. We have escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Please send us a DM so that we can look into your seating further. Thanks – Dan
@CallumRN Hi Callum, I appreciate you’re upset. Carry-on and checked baggage are weighed separately so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. - Dan

@coolestdudeva Hi, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks – Leslie
@BlueJadelz Hi Jade, sorry to hear about your experience. Are you able to send us a DM with more details? We would appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks -Kimmy

@Buzzman75 Hi Rhys, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Feel free to send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie
@juicymure Hi @juicymure, thanks for reaching out. Are you able to send us a DM with more information? We would like to look into this further. Thanks – Jeff
@fhina_ar Hi Arfina, Sorry to hear that there's no update yet with your missing baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference number? Thanks - Jeff

data.text: @TessRyan1 Hi Dr Tess, thanks for reaching out. Jetstar’s marketing of the route refers to Uluru however as the airport itself is called ‘Ayers Rock Airport’ (IATA Airport Code AYQ) this is also included. We appreciate your feedback. Thanks – Paul
@georgiamil Hi @georgiamil, our website is working fine at the moment. I suggest using another browser or clearing your current browser's cache and cookies. I hope it helps. Thanks – Paul
@EXIT99__ Hi there, sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM so we can look into this further. Thanks - Leslie

@EXIT99__ Hi @EXIT99__, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you need further assistance, you may send us a DM and we’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks - Jeff
@TimW_R Hi Timothy, sorry to hear that you haven't received your tax invoice yet. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Dan

@mglen1963 Hi Mickey. I appreciate how upsetting a delayed flight can be - we do our best to avoid them but sometimes things are out of our hands.  If you require assistance with your booking, feel free to DM us and quote JQINV585 to speak with an agent. Thanks – Jen
@BrunoGianelli9 Hi Bruno, I understand that you have questions about your flight status. Would you mind sending us a DM for us to look into this further? Thanks - Kimmy

@lesposen Hi Lesposen, That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear – and we’re sure Lisa will love to hear it too. We’ll definitely pass this! Thanks - Jeff

data.text: @at400684 Hi Alex, I appreciate how upsetting this is for you and your Wife. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and can be reached here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Jen

@ShaunMiller012 Hi Shaun, I appreciate how upsetting this is to have multiple cancellations. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, feel free to send us a DM so we can assist you further. Thanks- Jen
@saraelorama Hi Fernando, I understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Kimmy
@redandblackbomb Hi @redandblackbomb, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference number? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen
@ShilahReign Hi Shilah, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Feel free to send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks -Leslie

@edmund59 Hi Edmund, sorry to hear this, and I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change at the last minute. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi

@chetan_arora Hi Chetan, sorry to hear about your delayed flight. We do our best to avoid delays and you can be certain that our team is working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. Feel free to DM us if you'd like to discuss this further. – Paul
@JaniceIsidro Hi Janice, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff

@sotram11 Hi, Sotram. I'm sorry to hear about the difficulties the changes of schedule has caused you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy
@andrewecoulson Hi, Andrew. I'm really sorry to hear about your recent experience. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy
@cernoy_flynn Hi Flynn, I appreciate that you're not happy with the excess baggage fees. If you wish to discuss this further, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Vi

@oztish Hi Tish. Not all routes are on sale and some are selling out quite quickly due to the high demand. Keep your eyes peeled though as hopefully we’ll have another sale that you can take advantage of soon :) Thanks – Paul

@iooaanne Hi Yungz, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a DM with your complete name and booking reference. Thanks - Jeff
@cernoy_flynn Hi Flynn, I'm sorry to hear this. It's definitely not the sort of experience we want you to have with us. Thanks for letting us know and hopefully it doesn't happen again. Thanks - Jeff
@cernoy_flynn 2/2 We do require passengers to take responsibility for meeting the restrictions we advise. Thanks - Dan

@cernoy_flynn 1/2 Hi Flynn, I appreciate you’re upset. Your carry-on allowance is separate to your checked baggage allowance - which means there are still excess baggage fees if you go over the carry-on weight limit before you board your flight.
@_philBrown Hi Phil, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you want to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a DM and we'd be happy to assist you. Thanks - Jeff
@kaitinbgo Hi Kate, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Leslie
@amybuzz Hi, Amy. We’d love the chance to chat to you about this and help you select your seat. Would you mind sending us a DM? Thanks - Kimmy
@Yvonne59488640 Hi, Yvonne. Sorry to hear you’re having trouble processing your payment online. Would you mind sending us a DM for us to look into this further? Thanks - Kimmy
@LutonAlanWhite Hi there, sorry to hear this. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. – Leslie
@freshwatersean Hi, Sean. I'm sorry to hear about your recent difficulties. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@andrewecoulson Hi Andrew, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks – Leslie

@David80287266 Hi David, I'm sorry to hear about your delayed flight. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Feel free to DM us if you require further assistance with your booking. Thanks - Jay

@refucktionist Hi Binky, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance or would like to discuss your booking further, feel free to DM us with your booking details and we'd be happy to assist. Thanks - Jay

@ShaunMiller012 Hi Shaun, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’ll see what we can do to assist. Thanks - Jay
